name: safer-env
description: The whole environment as frozen namespace.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run cleancjs && npm run esm && npm run cleanesm && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default env;'>>esm/index.js
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
